ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: How do you feel?
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  I think that quitting EverQuest over a few ... My thoughts exactly. Very good response. Hehe, we sound like old timers.... Back in my day, we only
ygData.messageBody:
--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:

<snip>

I think that quitting EverQuest over a few
> changes is a bit
> extreme. But I guess what it comes down to is your
> enjoyment of the
> game. If you no longer enjoy it, then you do not
> have to play.
> luv,
> -Su
>

My thoughts exactly. Very good response.

Hehe, we sound like old timers.... "Back in my day, we
only had breeze and we were THANKFUL for it!" :)

I, for one, am happy with just about all the changes.

=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
